ai_generator.title: ตัวสร้าง AI
ai_generator.subtitle: สร้าง Codelab ด้วย Gemini
ai_generator.output_placeholder_desc: AI responses and drafts will appear here.
ai_generator.output_panel_notice: Results are shown on the right panel. Continue setting up here.
ai_generator.facilitator_notes_placeholder: e.g., Focus on beginner-friendly explanations, include troubleshooting tips, emphasize testing and verification steps.
ai_generator.facilitator_notes_desc: These notes will be injected into the AI prompt and should be reflected in the output.
ai_generator.mode_basic_desc: Quick single-pass generation from the provided code and files.
ai_generator.mode_prompt_desc: Generate a prompt-centric step flow for vibe coding/prototyping sessions.
ai_generator.mode_advanced_desc: Plan → draft → expert review → revise workflow with structured outputs.
ai_generator.mode_advanced_star_message: If Pro mode helped you, please consider starring the project on GitHub.
ai_generator.billing_desc: Google Search and URL Context tools may incur additional charges starting January 5, 2026.
ai_generator.placeholder:
// Paste your Rust, TypeScript, Python... code here
// Gemini will explain it step-by-step.
ai_generator.api_key_required: Please set your Gemini API Key in Settings first.
ai_generator.analyzing_desc: Gemini is crafting a step-by-step guide from your source code.
ai_generator.plan_loading_desc: Gemini is outlining objectives, setup, and steps.
ai_generator.draft_loading_desc: Gemini is turning the plan into a codelab draft.
ai_generator.review_loading_desc: Gemini is checking clarity, gaps, and improvements.
ai_generator.revise_loading_desc: Gemini is incorporating the expert feedback.
ai_generator.plan_comment_hint: Select text in the plan to add facilitator comments.
ai_generator.plan_comment_placeholder: Write a note to apply to the draft.
ai_generator.draft_subtitle: Review the first draft before expert review
ai_generator.draft_review_notes_placeholder: Add feedback for the expert review stage (e.g., tone changes, missing steps, corrections).
ai_generator.draft_review_notes_desc: These notes are injected into the expert review and revision prompts.
ai_generator.final_subtitle: Review the revised output and save
ai_generator.diff_desc: Review changes between draft and revised outputs.
ai_generator.diff_empty: Generate both draft and revised outputs to view the diff.
ai_generator.diff_too_large: Diff too large to render. Review the outputs instead.
ai_generator.upload_limits: Limit: up to {maxFiles} files per prompt, {maxSizeMb} MB each. ZIP files: up to {maxZipFiles} files, no audio/video.
ai_generator.error_parse: An unexpected error occurred while parsing the AI response. Please try again.

gemini.api_key_required_desc: To use AI features, you need a valid Google Gemini API key.
gemini.ask_question_placeholder: Ask a question about the code...
gemini.improvement_placeholder: e.g., More friendly, summarize, add code comments...
